contentEncoding.description: Content-Encoding of the object data, matching [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-3.1.2.2][RFC 7231 §3.1.2.2]

contentDisposition.description: Content-Disposition of the object data, matching [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6266][RFC 6266].

cacheControl.description: Cache-Control directive for the object data, matching [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7234#section-5.2"][RFC 7234 §5.2].

contentLanguage.description: Content-Language of the object data, matching [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-3.1.3.2][RFC 7231 §3.1.3.2].

metageneration.description: The version of the metadata for this object at this generation. Used for preconditions and for detecting changes in metadata. A metageneration number is only meaningful in the context of a particular generation of a particular object.

timeDeleted.description: The deletion time of the object. Will be returned if and only if this version of the object has been deleted.

contentType.description: Content-Type of the object data, matching [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-3.1.1.5][RFC 7231 §3.1.1.5]. If an object is stored without a Content-Type, it is served as `application/octet-stream`.

size.description: Content-Length of the object data in bytes, matching [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230#section-3.3.2][RFC 7230 §3.3.2].

timeCreated.description: The creation time of the object. Attempting to set this field will result in an error.

crc32c.description: CRC32c checksum. For more information about using the CRC32c checksum, see [https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/hashes-etags#_JSONAPI][Hashes and ETags: Best Practices].

componentCount.description: Number of underlying components that make up this object. Components are accumulated by compose operations. Attempting to set this field will result in an error.

md5Hash.description: MD5 hash of the data; encoded using base64 as per [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-4][RFC 4648 §4]. For more information about using the MD5 hash, see [https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/hashes-etags#_JSONAPI][Hashes and ETags: Best Practices].

etag.description: HTTP 1.1 Entity tag for the object. See [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3][RFC 7232 §2.3].

updated.description: The modification time of the object metadata.

kmsKeyName.description: Cloud KMS Key used to encrypt this object, if the object is encrypted by such a key.

timeStorageClassUpdated.description: The time at which the object's storage class was last changed.

temporaryHold.description: Whether an object is under temporary hold.

retentionExpirationTime.description: A server-determined value that specifies the earliest time that the object's retention period expires.

eventBasedHold.description: Whether an object is under event-based hold.

id.description: The ID of the object, including the bucket name, object name, and generation number.

bucket.description: The name of the bucket containing this object.

generation.description: The content generation of this object. Used for object versioning. Attempting to set this field will result in an error.

customerEncryption.description: Metadata of customer-supplied encryption key, if the object is encrypted by such a key.

kind.description: The kind of item this is. For objects, this is always "storage#object".

StorageObjectData.title: Storage Object Data
StorageObjectData.description: An object within Google Cloud Storage.

keySha256.description: SHA256 hash value of the encryption key.

CustomerEncryption.title: Customer Encryption
CustomerEncryption.description: Describes the customer-specified mechanism used to store the data at rest.
